block.p: SCHWARTZ-Seymour, of Morris Township, NJ, on Sunday, April 30, 2000. Husband of Iris (nee Kleban) Schwartz. Father of Barbara Schwartz of Atlanta, GA and Alan Schwartz of Randolph, NJ. Brother of Selma Yellis of Brooklyn. Grandfather of Allyson, Diane, Winston and Shayna. Funeral service on Tuesday, May 2, 2000 at 1PM, at the Dangler Funeral Home, 600 Speedwell Ave., Morris Plains, NJ. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the Temple B'Nai Or Building Fund, Overlook Rd., Morristown, NJ 07960 or to the American Cancer Society, Morris Unit, 669 Littleton Rd., Parsippany, New Jersey 07054.
